title: Forced Client update crashes game on load
body:
Hi Riot,

I just tried to load into a ranked game, the client would not go to load screen. Completed Queue and Champion select. Once screen turned black it just crashed out and forced my client to update. Why was my account able to load into ranked lobby without the update, further, the issue cause my account to cop a remake, I don't care for the LP but I would like to know why this is even possible.

Regards,
Bennett

replies.body:
Hey there,

More than likely your client was repairing rather than "updating".
